T02D3622:242b-1: sapta sha ti ka kalpokta ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam /
T02D3622:242b-3: rtog pa bdun brgya pa las gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3622:242b-4: dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3622:242b-5: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi gnas pa
T02D3622:242b-6: zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs
T02D3622:242b-8: de nas ri rab yan lag brgyad pa rin po
T02D3622:242b-9: che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin la de'i dbus su
T02D3622:242b-10: dpag tshad stong gi tshad kyi gdan la nye bar
T02D3622:242b-11: 'dug ste / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro
T02D3622:242b-12: ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas lus dang
T02D3622:242b-13: ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D3622:242b-14: de yis de bzhin du nam mkha' khyab pa'i nyi
T02D3622:242b-15: ma'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par khyab par sprul nas
T02D3622:242b-16: / de la de bzhin du h'um yig 'bar ba las 'od zer gyi rnam par bsam zhing /
T02D3622:242b-17: de nas lus ngag yid thams cad rdo rje rnams
T02D3622:242b-18: kyis phyag 'tshal bas aom a'a: h'um zhes pa 'dis
T02D3622:242b-19: phyogs bcu'i mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
T02D3622:242b-20: bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3622:242b-21: gdan drangs nas ye shes kyi rnam pas rab tu
T02D3622:242b-22: zhugs te / slar yang h'um yig gnyis pas rta
T02D3622:242b-23: mgrin yang dag par bskul zhing gdan drangs nas rab
T02D3622:242b-24: tu zhugs te h'um yig gsum pas bdag nyid de
T02D3622:242b-25: bzhin du rta mgrin bzhin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D3622:242b-26: gyi bdag nyid can sku mdog dmar po 'jigs su
T02D3622:242b-28: drag po sma ra dmar ser can /
T02D3622:242b-33: 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3622:242b-34: zhal gnyis pa sngo zhing 'jigs su rung ba'i h'i
T02D3622:242b-35: h'i'i sgra sgrogs shing tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo
T02D3622:242b-37: gnyis pas srid pa la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa la'o //
T02D3622:242b-39: mi'u thung gi rnam pa can /
T02D3622:243a-2: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3622:243a-3: lha dang lha ma yin mtha' dag la bsdigs par mdzad pa /
T02D3622:243a-4: rdo rje dang dbyug pa bsnams pa /
T02D3622:243a-5: rta mgrin las kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D3622:243a-6: sngags ni aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'i:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes te /
T02D3622:243a-7: bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D3622:243a-11: bcud kyis len la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub
T02D3622:243a-12: pas mngon du 'gyur ro zhes rtog pa bdun brgya
T02D3622:243a-14: / cis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas pa 'bum
T02D3622:243a-15: phrag gsum byas pas 'khor los sgyur pa dang rgyal
T02D3622:243a-17: lha'i bu mo dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor zhing rig 'dzin ma mdun du byas te /
T02D3622:243a-18: de la bde ba'i 'bras bu nyams su myong zhing gnas so ;
T02D3622:243a-19: / lha'i dbang pos gdugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D3622:243a-21: thag bzangs ris kyi dmag dpon dang /
T02D3622:243a-24: lha rnams mtha' dag stobs med par 'gyur ro //
T02D3622:243a-25: gcer bu pa'i slob dpon bde byed dang mtha' dag
T02D3622:243a-26: gi yon tan rnams nye bar ston par byed do
T02D3622:243a-27: // ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa mngon par ma rtogs pa de srid du gnas so //
T02D3622:243a-28: mngon par rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag
T02D3622:243a-29: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur
